snippet: The two-time Olympic figure skating gold medalist Yevgeny Plushenko, 31, said Wednesday that he wanted to take part in the 2018 Winter Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
abstract: Two-time Olympic figure skating gold medalist Evgeni Plushenko plans to come out of retirement to compete for Russia in the 2018 Olympic Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic figure skating gold medalist Yevgeny Plushenko, 31, said Wednesday that he wanted to take part in the 2018 Winter Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.

headline.main: Plushenko Says He Wants to Return for 2018 Olympics
